name: Blogroll In Posts
author: Cool Ryan

sections.description: Ever want to use your blogroll in your pages or posts? Ever wanted to show a list of links in a category without editing your templates or using a sidebar widget? Now you can! Easily add and customize a link list with this easy to use plugin. Simply add the [blogroll] shortcode to your pages or posts and it will automatically convert into a full fledged blogroll!
sections.installation:
WordPress Installer

  1. After you have downloaded your file, log into your WordPress Admin Section.
  2. Go to Plugins-> Add New.
  3. Go to the Upload Link.
  4. Navigate to your file.
  5. Click on the Upload Button.
  6. After it is has installed, click on the Activation Link.

Manual Installation

  1. Upload blogroll-in-posts.php plugin file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Easily add your blogroll or links list into your posts and pages!
description: Ever want to use your blogroll in your pages or posts? Ever wanted to show a list of links in a category without editing your templates or using a sidebar widget? Now you can! Easily add and customize a link list with this easy to use plugin. Simply add the [blogroll] shortcode to your pages or posts and it will automatically convert into a full fledged blogroll!
